modules.name: large_scale_data_management
recommendedLiterature: T. Öszu, P. Valduriez Principles of Distributed Database Systems, Springer, 4th ed., 2020
H. Garcia-Molina, J. D. Ullman, J. Widom Database Systems: The Complete Book, Prentice Hall, 2nd ed., 2008
modules.additionalPrerequisite: Very good knowledge of database systems, good knowledge of algorithms and data structures as well as Java programming

modules.name: data_mining
recommendedLiterature: Pang-Ning Tan, Michael Steinback, Vipin Kumar: Introduction to Data Mining, 2nd Edition, Pearson.
Aurélien Géron: Hands-on Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras & TensorFlow, 3rd Edition, O’Reilly.
modules.additionalPrerequisite: Foundations of Statistics, Practical Informatics I

modules.name: machine_learning
recommendedLiterature: K.P. Murphy. Probabilistic Machine Learning: An Introduction. The MIT Press, 2022
I. Goodfellow, Y. Bengio, A. Courville. Deep Learning, The MIT Press, 2017
Additional material and articles provided in lecture notes
modules.additionalPrerequisite: knowledge of probability and statistics, no attempted or completed IE 675 exam

modules.name: data_security_and_privacy
modules.additionalPrerequisite: knowledge in cryptography or IT-security is recommended
